Posts.Content: Jan 4, 2010 02:14PM - edited Jan 4, 2010 02:15PM by Ozma58 Lovetosail - my hair started coming out Jan 1, 15 days after my first tx. You are so right, it is devastating and I am debating when to buzz it. I am trying to convince myself that this is a positive transformation (like a caterpiller to butterfly).  Not having much luck. Happy, healthy New Year to all. Pam

It was liberating!  Lovetosail, forget caterpillar  to butterfly analogy and think Demi Moore in G.I. Jane! Best to everyone, Pam
